favourite.article: Thou art our love and satisfaction, nothing else we would pursue!

As soon as I try to sing these precious words the tears fall down my cheeks, my heart wells with Love for our Jesus. O dear Jesus. I think of Watchman Nee composing these lyrics, persecuted, facing imprisonment, possible torture and the words he penned carry the truth of his testimony. To sing this song is very humbling. How Jesus loved him and blessed him with His precious love.
Ephesians 3:14-21: 14 For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, 15 Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named, 16 That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man; 17 That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love, 18 May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height; 19 And to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God. 20 Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us, 21 Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.

To be in tears while obeying, yet still not change in standing is all by the Lord's grace. It is wonderful that despite all the difficulties we encounter, whether because of the flesh or by trial, something still holds us to keep us going on and not give up. The Lord never give us up! We cannot change in standing because He Himself cannot. What a grace!
Dear Lord Jesus, how can I still stubborn be? Lord, may You soften my heart.

Void are all my other seekings, Every pride hath disappeared. All I long for is Thy pleasure, And the peace Thy love would bring. All I yearn for is Thy coming And Thy presence’ sweet embrace. Thou art all that I desire, Nothing else I would pursue. Matchless One, unrivaled beauty, None can e’er compete with Thee.

Every time I want to be refreshed in my love toward the Lord I love to sing this song. It reminds me that He is everything to me. He is so sweet and lovely. He's my love and satisfaction and my everlasting portion. Oh Lord Jesus may Your way only will I choose. Capture me oh Lord with Your love. May I gain You more each day Lord. I love You more Lord Jesus.
Fantastic music, lovely words all combine to make this a truly anointed song.
When I hear this hymn, it reminds me that my love is a "because" love. I love Him because He first loved me. 'Tis the joy to be His bondslave.
There is nothing I enjoy more than singing this song intimately with my Lord.
Thou hast won each love from me! Oh Lord.

Oh Lord Jesus! Thank You for everything You have for me, I Love You! Matt. 27:51 "Behold the veil of temple was torn in two from top to bottom." Lord, You died for me, Your enemy! Oh Lord I praise and glorify You! I love You!
You're my love and satisfaction, You are my everlasting portion. How we love Thee. Oh Lord Jesus!

The Emollient Glow of the Anointing is strongly on this song, this tune. Such peace and calming of my soul, beautiful so beautiful is the love and peace of the Father. Why fear or be troubled with knowing God's rich love and protection.

Every time I come to this hymn, I am reminded again of the Lord's presence and love for me. His love is so great, that He died on the cross for us. It is lustful to pursue anyone else's love. God's love for us is enough, since it is wider than the ocean and deeper than the sea. Let us love the Lord with our first love!

I love this hymn very much. I first sang it a few weeks ago in a YP meeting. It touched me very very much. Especially I liked this part: 'Tis my love to be Thy bondslave, 'Tis my joy to Thee obey. Dear LORD JESUS I love YOU very much!

Dear LORD JESUS, PRECIOUS JESUS. This song speaks of how precious You are to us even in our trials and tribulations. Oh Lord Jesus, Precious Jesus how sweet the name oh to call. Oh Lord Jesus, precious Jesus. Thank You Lord we can call on Your precious name. Oh Lord Thou art my everlasting portion, oh matchless one, oh Lord, my love and satisfaction. Oh Lord praise You, for You came to be our portion. You gave all to gain us. Oh Lord by Your mercy and grace may we gain You each day.
This song is really touching and marvelous. Jesus Christ is great.
Stanza 4 really touched me. The Lord sometimes allows us to shed tears, but we can't help but follow Him and His pleasure. His love constrains us.

This is a precious song to me! I am young and love person. For us saints is to practice the importance of the Lord's love. We should always come to the Lord by, reading the bible, singing a hymn, calling on his name or just praying. By this the Lord will make his home in our heart
